blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 0978839 | website = | footnotes = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_density_sq_mi = 788.95 | population_density_km2 = }} Clifton Park is a suburban town in Saratoga County, New York, United States. According to the United States Census Bureau, the 2020 population was 38,029. The town is in the south part of the county and is located north of Albany, northeast of Schenectady, and south of Saratoga Springs. ==References== Category:Towns in New York (state)
